snippet.title: Cinematic: "Safe Haven" (EU)
snippet.description:
Varok Saurfang realizes that that if he is to secure a future for the Horde, he must reach out to the one who led it in the past.

Try World of Warcraft for free: https://worldofwarcraft.com/en-gb/start
Learn more about World of Warcraft at: https://worldofwarcraft.com/en-gb/
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://www.YouTube.com/user/WorldofWarcraft?sub_confirmation=1
Listen to the Audio Book Tomb of Sargeras: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY0KbDiiFYeOQq66pDCI2E7-ETpVXCB4N
Listen to the Audio Book A Thousand Years of War: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY0KbDiiFYePo89LtAJ2lYvHllzg4kdHR

Find us on...
Facebook: https://facebook.com/WorldofWarcraft.eu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/warcraft
YouTube: http://YouTube.com/WorldofWarcraft
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/wow/profile

In World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth the seventh expansion to Blizzard Entertainment’s acclaimed massively multiplayer online role-playing game, the fall of the Burning Legion sets off a series of disastrous incidents that reignites the conflict at the heart of the Warcraft® saga.

Learn more about Battle for Azeroth: https://worldofwarcraft.com/en-gb/battle-for-azeroth
